item.title: [BHS5/GRA5/7/9][ManagedKubernetesService] - Nodes underlying OS LTS update
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 22, 08:30 UTC  -  May 31, 16:00 UTC

Apr 7, 10:16 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/05/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 31/05/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will upgrade our public cloud nodes underlying OS from Ubuntu 18.04 LTS to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS.
Only clusters with an upgrade policy set to "always update" are targeted

item.title: [GLOBAL][Managed Kubernetes Service] Internal component maintenance
item.description:
Apr 11, 16:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 7, 00:48 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/04/2023 16:00 UTC
End time : 11/04/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Public API used to managed MKS resources will still be responsive but could return some errors temporarily.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Managed Kubernetes service, we will be doing an internal maintenance on the Kubernetes API.
This maintenance windows is scheduled to inform you that during our intervention, the Managed Kubernetes Service API used to manage the cluster lifecycle will still be reachable but could return some errors during a few seconds. No impact expected on workload deployed in MKS cluster.
